verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tunakuwa tunasinzia
hatujitambui,
tunaamka tunajikuta
tungali hai.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Furaha furaha furaha furaha,
Bwana Yesu furaha
shangwe na chereko
na furaha,
furaha furaha sana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mawio mpaka macheo
huambatana nasi,
usiku nguzo ya moto
na mchana ya wingu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kwenye machozi muda
wote tunalia naye,
anatuinua mkono
tukacheka naye.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tunapoondokewa na ndugu
zetu wachache,
anatupa tumaini kuwapokea
kwake.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tunajivuna kwa sababu
tunaye Mungu,
tunamuomba awe nasi
daima milele.
